## Government Tender Announcement: Steel and Fire-Rated Doors and Frames
____________________________________________________

### Title: 
Steel and Fire-Rated Doors and Frames RFSO

### Reference Number: 
WS3952173337-Doc4063374207

### Public Tender Notice: 
Release of Standing Offer Opportunity

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Steel and Fire-Rated Doors and Frames. The item scope includes:

* **Procurement Category:** General Departmental
* **Procurement Reference Number:** WS3952173337-Doc4063374207
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), among others.
* **Trade Agreements Description:** Adheres to all mentioned trade agreements.
* **Regions Of Opportunity:** Proposed sources and/or solutions should be sourced from manufacturers within Canada (Ontario), excluding National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding NCR)
* **Delivery Location:** Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden

**Award Information:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Tony Fong (SPAC)
	+ Email: [tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Requirements:**

* **Tender Description:** The DND, Real Property Operations Detachment (RP Ops Det) Borden requires Steel and Fire-Rated Doors and Frames for Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden.
* **Award Period:** July 1, 2023 – June 30, 2025, with an option for a one-year extension.
* **Submission Date and Time:** July 12, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* **Closing Time Modification:** Please disregard Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time, and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 12, 2023 at 14:00
